alert.note: Alert for Boise Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 27 at 3:10AM MST until November 28 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 5 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow and gusty winds. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches in valleys, with 7 to 12 inches in the mountains. Winds gusting as high as 25 mph Sunday night. * WHERE...Boise Mountains zone. * WHEN...From noon today to 5 PM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and reduced visibility. Travel could be very difficult along Highway 21 north of Idaho City. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will produce blowing snow which could quickly cover roadways.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
